test cnv-X 1 5905000 6110000 !> 1x + 1 3
test cnv-X 1 6415000 6465000 >> 1x + 1 -3
test cnv-X 1 7430000 7665000 >! 1x + 1 3
test cnv 1 5905000 6110000 !> 1 131110000 1 3
test cnv 1 6415000 6465000 >> 1 131465000 1 -3
test cnv 1 7430000 7665000 >! 1 132665000 1 3
test del 1 4490000 7620000 -> 1 7620000 0 0 
test inv 2 2575000 2700000 -> 2 2700000 0 -1
test trn1 1 2550000 2925000 -> 1 7550000 0 1
test trn2 1 2550000 2925000 -> 2 7550000 0 1
